ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlem.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_tfrlem8 | |- Ord dom recs ( F ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ordirr | |- ( Ord dom recs ( F ) -> -. dom recs ( F ) e. dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- -. dom recs ( F ) e. dom recs ( F ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_tfrlem12 | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) e. A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elssuni | |- ( ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) e. A -> ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) C_ U. A ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_recsfval | |- recs ( F ) = U. A |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6sseqr | |- ( ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) e. A -> ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) C_ recs ( F ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_dmss | |- ( ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) C_ recs ( F ) -> dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) C_ dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 9, 10 | #P_3syl | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) C_ dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 12 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> Ord dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom recs ( F ) e. _V ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elon2 | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On <-> ( Ord dom recs ( F ) /\ dom recs ( F ) e. _V ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom recs ( F ) e. On ) |
| 16 |  | #P_sucidg | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> dom recs ( F ) e. suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom recs ( F ) e. suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 5 | #P_tfrlem10 | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) Fn suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) Fn suc dom recs ( F ) -> dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 20 | 15, 18, 19 | #P_3syl | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 21 | 17, 20 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom recs ( F ) e. dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) ) |
| 22 | 11, 21 | #P_sseldd | |- ( recs ( F ) e. _V -> dom recs ( F ) e. dom recs ( F ) ) |
